sentences.english: An analysis of her tooth enamel suggests she ate fruit, nuts and leaves.
sentences.chinese: 通過對牙釉質分析，她以水果，堅果及樹葉爲食。

sentences.english: Teeth are covered in a hard coating called enamel.
sentences.chinese: 牙齒被一種硬硬的叫做牙釉質的物體所籠蓋。

sentences.english: In young children, teeth that have recently emerged have weak enamel and are highly susceptible to acid decay.
sentences.chinese: 最近表明，小孩子的牙釉質極易受酸侵蝕。

sentences.english: Preliminary study on desulfurization by sodium bicarbonate and discussion of its optimum condition;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究碳酸氫鈉溶液對人牙釉質抗酸性的影響。

sentences.english: Their technique measures the warping of tooth enamel inflicted by radiation, detected in electron paramagnetic resonance.
sentences.chinese: 他們使用電子順磁共振測定了輻射對牙釉質的影響。

sentences.english: A cavity forms when the tooth decay breaks through the enamel to the underlying layers of the tooth.
sentences.chinese: 當蛀壞到突破了牙釉質層，齲齒就形成。

sentences.english: Synthesis of isoamyi propionate catalyzed by sodium hydrogen sulfate under microwave irradiation;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究碳酸氫鈉溶液對人牙釉質抗酸性的影響。

sentences.english: Upper front teeth that are paper thin, with the enamel almost completely worn away, and teeth that hurt.
sentences.chinese: 上端前齒過薄，牙釉質幾乎消失，牙齒也有損傷。

sentences.english: The proteolytic phenomenon in enamel caries has been investigated from three directions.
sentences.chinese: 作者從三個方面探討牙釉質齲病變中的蛋白溶解現象。

sentences.english: I opt out, since it seems like it must wear down the enamel.
sentences.chinese: 出於對損壞牙釉質的擔憂，我退而遠之。
